description:
Gabe is a hot straight guy who loves to chase girls, ride motorcycles, and hang out.
He had just moved across country when I met him outside a sports bar. Being new to the area, he was looking for work. He wasn't terribly interested in modeling when I brought up the subject, but we talked for a while and eventually he warmed up to the idea.
The most amazing thing about Gabe is his balls... they're huge for his size! I had a sneak preview before we did the video and those suckers hang! Very cute butt too...
He was quite nervous once the camera started rolling (as you'll see in the interview portion), but quickly got into pleasuring himself while watching pussy porn.
title: Gabe
